text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(In truth, the Mejiro family had a prior commitment on this date. 
They said it was fine, but… I'll definitely have to 
make it up to them next time)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(…… but I don't regret my decision. Taiki has been crying 
in secret every night for a while now. Her eyes are all red 
and I just can't leave her alone.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
What's this? It's addressed "To Dober"…… 
A gift… and a letter?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: …… Oh, it's from Ryan. I wonder what's going on.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: "I thought you might have the camp thing on your mind still! So I'm writing to say 'don't mind'. If anything I'm glad."

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: "I'm proud that you noticed your friend's troubles and wanted to reach out!"

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: "I know you're a little reserved, but you pick things up well. You might not know, but we can always count on you!"

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: "So… believe in yourself and go have a great time! I got you some clothes with that in mind!"

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
…… Ryan…… Thank you…… 
Heheh, I wonder what kind of clothes she—eeeh!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(Oh dear, Ryan's having too much fun with this! 
I wouldn't buy such daring open-back clothing……!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(…… But, alright. I want to do my best. Since she went 
through the trouble of sending me these as a "Go for it!")

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
(Don't shrink back like you usually do, be bold! 
I'm going to give Taiki some great memories……!)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
I'll explain again.…… To find the "Dreamstone", 
we must first find two hidden clues.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
One is near the river that runs north to southwest 
through the campgrounds…… The area is known as 
the "Lonely River" in the movie.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
The other is hidden deep in the woods beyond the barbecue 
clearing. This is the area known as "Gille Dubh's Garden".

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Once we have passed the traps in each area and obtained 
the two stones, we will head for the rocks on the coast.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
"The Palace of Oberon"…… 
That is the cave where the "Dreamstone" is hidden……!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
We should be able to search for the Dreamstone inside 
once we can open the doors with the two stones!

text_block_list.name: All 3
text_block_list.text: Ohhhh……!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: "Lonely River" and "Gille Dubh's Garden"……! Hoho, it really sounds like a world of fiction～!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe. Let's set off to the "Lonely River" 
where the first stone is hidden then……!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Wao……! Hey, Dober! 
Red mushrooms! I've seen these in a picture book before!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: This tree over here…… looks like a person's face～!? Amazing!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ¡Whoaaaaaa! Roots in human shape!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Human face tree!? Mandragora!? 
Wherewherewhere!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Oh for crying…… 
Don't wander too far off now!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ehehe. I'm glad they seem to be enjoying it.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Come to think of it, in the story there is also a sacred spring 
where Undine lives around here.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
From what I can tell on the map…… 
Well, I wouldn't expect them to reproduce such a―

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Waaaah…! 
What's all this!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Dober, Rob Roy! There's a spring over here… So beautiful!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Ehh………? 
D-did they really… The Spring of Undine……!?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Wow, wow ……! I thought the terrain looked similar, 
but I didn't expect to see it replicated so well!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: I don't see anything, but, maybe Undine is here too!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Heh? Undine……!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
If I listen closely, I can hear… sounds of singing, 
and dancing… Or something, maybe……?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Songs, and dances, and maybes…!!
(Click!)

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Ahahaha! Goodness! I got a very happy photo!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I… I'm sorry, I got a bit too excited……!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Rob Roy! What else do you have for us!? Well～? …Maybe a wizard's house!?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Eheheh…… Let's see, I'm sure we can find the river of the 
Kelpie, or the blue cave where the Faerie King lives 
somewhere around here as well!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
The world of "Rhodonite" is so vast and deep……! 
I'm sure we can find many more thrills!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
FOOOOO! 
The adventure, it only starts here! GOGOGO!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
……What a relief. Taiki looks like she's 
enjoying herself so much right now.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I wish I could entertain her like that all the time…… 
Mm, I need to push myself and work harder too……!
